mapper.select: SELECT ユーザー.user_id, ユーザー.name, users_mail_address.mail_address, ユーザー.date_of_birth, ユーザー.phone_number, ユーザー.gender FROM 給与.ユーザー as ユーザー INNER JOIN ( SELECT user_id, max(register_date) as register_date FROM 給与.users_mail_address GROUP BY user_id ) AS leatest on ( ユーザー.user_id = leatest.user_id ) INNER JOIN 給与.users_mail_address as users_mail_address on ( ユーザー.user_id = users_mail_address.user_id and leatest.register_date = users_mail_address.register_date ) WHERE ユーザー.user_id = #{identifier.value}
